Auth.subtitle: Unlock the Power of Collaboration and Connect with Your Dream Team!
Auth.an_account_will_be_created: An account will be created if you don't have one.

Site.title: Find the next project to be part of.
Site.subtitle: The powerhouse platform for connecting visionaries and Cultivating Success. Step into a world of collaboration and innovation.

Projects.new_project_description: Unlock the power of collaboration: find like-minded teammates to elevate your project and make your vision a resounding success.
Projects.add_available_roles_description: Identify the key roles needed for your project's success, ranging from developers to designers, marketers, and more.
Projects.name: Project name
Projects.summary_description: Summarize what your project aims to achieve in one line.
Projects.icon_description: The icon image should have an aspect ratio of 1/1 for a better looking. The formats allowed are .png, .jpg, .webp
Projects.categories_max: Choose a maximum of 2 categories that represent your project.
Projects.description_placeholder: Craft a captivating and concise description that showcases the core of your project. Clearly convey your project's purpose, goals, and any specific requirements to attract potential teammates. A well-written description will help others visualize themselves joining your project and contribute their skills and passion. By providing a clear and engaging summary, you increase the likelihood of finding like-minded individuals eager to collaborate and bring your project to life.
Projects.city_description: Specialy usefull when you project require teammates near you.
